tag_list: robytj, junesoftware, indigo-architects, june-infrastructure, taptolearn, foxbooks, pockethealth
overview:
Roby John, founder at June software and June Infrastructure. At June, I work on building mobile apps and application platforms for Education and Mobile Games.

We built TapToLearn, an Educational Apps Company with over 3 top 10 apps. We built PocketHealth.in , an electronic health records company for Orthopaedic surgeons in India.

I have been working at startups since 2000 in Pune, India and the Silicon Valley. During all my previous jobs I have been an entrepreneurial Product Manager and product developer all my professional life.
